title: screen connector for a1286
message:
hi , 
          i have got a 2012 a1286 , 820-3330-b board and it was liquid damaged , screen cable and connector both damaged , As no 2012 screen connector (silver styled) is available anywhere in uk. so now planning to replace the connector with the older type(golden) connector rather than 2012 (silver) connector and fit the old 2011 (golden) type cable . 
i hope u guys can understand what i have written above .

has anyone tried that and is it ok as i am assuming that there isnt anything different in the screen pins layout .
kindly advise
thanks

title: screen connector for a1286
message: It's fine but you should change the cable too.

title: screen connector for a1286
message:
thanks for the reply , 
yes i am changing the cable . :)
